short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Tag game right in your web-browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the help of this extension, now you can play tag game with your friends right in your browser with a single click.

Tag by JetGames is a multiplayer game where you can play tag with your friends. Up to 4 players can join in.

How to Play Tag

Player 1: W, A, D
Player 2: Up, Right, Left
Player 3: I, J, L
Player 4: T, F, H

In Tag you run around to avoid the chaser. Shortcuts help you get away fast and the teleport is a great way to waste the chaser’s time. Get your friends, and see who will be the best at getting away.

We made this extension simple and fun. No complicated settings or controls. Just install and you’re ready to play with a single click.

Have fun and tag today! Install now!
